scripts.build: yarn build:wasm && yarn build:margin && yarn build:app
scripts.build:cloudflare: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y && . "$HOME/.cargo/env" && cargo install wasm-pack && yarn build:wasm && yarn build:margin && yarn build:app
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules app/node_modules libraries/ts/margin/node_modules tests/node_modules app/build app/dist libraries/ts/margin/dist
scripts.docs:rust: cargo doc -p jet-margin -p jet-margin-pool -p jet-margin-swap --no-deps && cp -r ./target/doc/* ./docs/margin-rust
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint && git add .
scripts.test:gui: cd app && yarn e2e:gui && cd ../app-beta && yarn e2e:gui
scripts.dev: yarn --cwd libraries/ts/margin watch & yarn --cwd app dev
